      • importMap

        public static char[][] importMap(java.lang.String file)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Imports map from .map format to two dimensional array. Reads map size from the text file.
        Parameters:
        file - .map file containing the map
        Returns:
        char[][] containing the map
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error if accessing the map fails.

      • exportMap

        public static void exportMap(char[][] map,
                             java.lang.String algorithm)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Exports map in to .map file two dimensional char array.
        Parameters:
        map - Map to be exported
        algorithm - Algorithm name for naming the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown error, if error occurs during IO access

      • writeNodeListToMap

        public static char[][] writeNodeListToMap(NodeList nodes,
                                          char[][] map)
        Takes node list as input and marks included nodes with 'X' on given map.
        Parameters:
        nodes - List of nodes to be written on a map
        map - Map where the nodes will be marked
        Returns:
        Returns the map with markings.

      • copyMap

        public static char[][] copyMap(char[][] mapToCopy)
        Manual two dimensinal array copy, without manipulating the old map.
        Parameters:
        mapToCopy - Map to be copied
        Returns:
        Return the new map.
